data.text: we stayed  at gulf court hotel dubai , hotel location is best near metro and mall , hotel room are very comfortable and good 'all staff are helpful and friendly room clean super and well maintain ,i would like to thank all hotel staff and espically from housekeeping shee and her senior housekeeping supervisor mr mohan and laundry guys mr waqas,
data.title: super and  friendly housekeeping

data.text: it's very good hotel, good food, good cleaning service very helpful and clean, they put everything we want and they're polite, I met the house keeping shee , she's helpful and good , this hotel is bery good for vacation with family and friends.
data.title: House Keeping

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Mr. Rayhan,

Thank you for your positive feedback! We're thrilled to hear that you had a great experience at our hotel and that you found our housekeeping service to be excellent. Providing a clean and comfortable environment for our guests is a top priority for us, and we're glad that Shee and the rest of our housekeeping team were able to meet your expectations.

We appreciate your kind words about our food and overall service. It's wonderful to know that you found our hotel to be a great option for vacations with family and friends.

If there's anything else we can do to make your future stays even more enjoyable, please don't hesitate to let us know. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Sincerely,
 
Abdelrazek Shaban 
Duty Manager & Team 
Gulf Court Hotel Business Bay – Dubai
owner_response.author: Austine Obare

data.text:
Thank you for the nice hospitality and welcoming attitude. 

I want to express my good feelings about specially one person: Jafeer

He has a very genuine service mentality and is always polite and spreads a good mood. He is also always here with a helping hand when you need him and is definitely doing more than he has to. 

He deserves a raise I guess. 

Best regards
data.title: Give Jafeer a raise

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Mr. Christoph,

Thank you for your kind words and feedback! We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our hospitality and welcoming attitude during your stay.

We truly appreciate your recognition of Jafeer's outstanding service mentality, politeness, and positive attitude. He takes pride in going above and beyond to assist our guests, and we're delighted that he made a positive impression on you. and we'll be sure to pass along your feedback to our management team for consideration. It's wonderful to hear that his efforts have been appreciated and valued by our guests like you.

We look forward to welcoming you back for another enjoyable stay!

Sincerely,
 
Abdelrazek Shaban 
Duty Manager & Team 
Gulf Court Hotel Business Bay – Dubai
owner_response.author: Austine Obare

data.text: The food was really amazing with good im new in dubai but was extremely happy with the assisted service from sarin .with happy smiling face taking care of us we just loved his service .the live counter was unique with good variety of food happy to be here will come to this place again with my friends
data.title: buffet breakfast

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Mr. Vishnu,

Thank you for your wonderful review of our buffet breakfast! We're thrilled to hear that you found the food amazing and that you were extremely happy with the assisted service provided by Sarin. It's fantastic to know that his happy and smiling face made your experience even more enjoyable.

We're delighted that you loved the unique live counter and the variety of food options available. We can't wait to welcome you back to our hotel again, this time with your friends!

If you have any further comments or if there's anything else we can assist you with, please don't hesitate to let us know. We look forward to serving you again soon.

Sincerely,
 
Abdelrazek Shaban 
Duty Manager & Team 
Gulf Court Hotel Business Bay – Dubai
owner_response.author: Austine Obare

data.text: its good i had a lot of fun especially with the ammenities and services they have here available such as breakfast serving my favourite foods as it is super complex and very yummy. with the swimming pool i had no problems with, as it was in an ideal height but could be a bit deeper.
data.title: good breakfasts

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Mr. Samuel,

Thank you for sharing your experience with us! We're thrilled to hear that you had a lot of fun at Gulf Court Hotel Business Bay and enjoyed the amenities and services available at our hotel, especially the breakfast. It's fantastic to know that you found the breakfast options to be complex and very yummy.

We're also glad to hear that you had a pleasant experience with the swimming pool, although we appreciate your feedback about the depth. We'll certainly take your comments into consideration as we strive to improve our facilities for our guests' enjoyment.

If you have any further comments or if there's anything else we can assist you with, please don't hesitate to let us know. We look forward to welcoming you back for another enjoyable stay!

Sincerely,
 
Abdelrazek Shaban 
Duty Manager & Team 
Gulf Court Hotel Business Bay – Dubai
owner_response.author: Austine Obare
